scripts.postinstall: (cd lambda/nodelayer/nodejs && npm install) && mkdir -p lambda/nodelayer/nodejs/node_modules/deepblooback/ && cp -a ../../DeepblooBack/controllers lambda/nodelayer/nodejs/node_modules/deepblooback/ && (pipenv --version || pip install pipenv --user) && ( [ -e Pipfile.lock ] || pipenv lock ) && pipenv sync --bare
scripts.clean: rm -fr lambda/*/*.py lambda/*/*/*.py lambda/pipenv lib/textract-pipeline-stack.js cdk.out
